Posts.Content: Hi I'm new to discussion board although all comments have been really helpful.I'm 43 and I was diagnosed with breast cancer a few weeks ago.on Thursday I had left breast mastectomy and axillary node clearance.I'm due to start chemo soon and I'm dreading losing my hair.BCN told me about scalp freeze to retain hair growth.I'm not sure as I've been told its incredibly uncomfortable.I would appreciate any advice for or against so I can make an informed decision.many thanks if you have time to answer.
